details: Design and implementation of a complex full-stack production system for real-time collaborative defense planning.
Development of comprehensive automated unit & E2E testing and containerization of large preexisting codebase
Agile development experience, git and issue tracking experience.
Reviews of design and implementation, fostering of positive team culture and graduate mentoring.
Cross platform desktop application with installer available for Windows.
Rust based backend infastructure built with Tauri. Used for webview rendering and secure filesystem manipulation operations.
